statements: CREATE TABLE crops (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, type STRING, quantity INT);
CREATE TABLE users (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, first_name STRING, last_name STRING, email STRING);
CREATE TABLE orders (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, product_id UUID, quantity INT, status STRING);
CREATE TABLE crops (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_name VARCHAR(255), crop_type VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE farms (farm_id INT PRIMARY KEY, farm_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE example (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), type VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE farmers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT, location VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE crops (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_name VARCHAR(50), crop_type VARCHAR(50), farmer_id INT REFERENCES farmers(id))
CREATE TABLE fields (field_id INT PRIMARY KEY, field_name VARCHAR(50), field_size FLOAT, crop_id INT REFERENCES crops(crop_id))
CREATE TABLE harvest (harvest_id INT PRIMARY KEY, harvest_date DATE, quantity INT, crop_id INT REFERENCES crops(crop_id))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS farm (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), location VARCHAR(100), established_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS crop (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), type VARCHAR(50), growing_season VARCHAR(50), yield_per_acre FLOAT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS farmer (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), phone_number VARCHAR(15)
